attributes.action: Mandate longer sentences for sexual abuse, pedophila and human trafficking
attributes.additional_details: We want tougher sentences and more protection and help for the victims of sexual abuse
attributes.background: Mandate longer sentences for sexual abuse, pedophila and human trafficking

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

If you're concerned about a particular case, you might be interested to know that anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low if the crime was tried in a Crown Court. Only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
